sentences: Ta oli parem kui kõikidest teistest konkurentidest.
Kõikidest võimalustest valis ta kõige kasulikuma.
context: The word 'kõikidest' is the elative case (from/out of) plural form of 'kõik', meaning 'all' or 'everyone'. It indicates something coming out from among all people, things, or options. In English, this would translate to phrases like 'from all', 'from everyone', or 'of all' depending on context.
